```py
CREATE TABLE Countries(
    Country_id int,
    Country_name varchar(255),
    Continent varchar(255),
    Population int
);
```

```py
INSERT INTO countries(Country_id,Country_name, Continent,Population)
VALUES (1,'Somalia','Africa',14000000);
```

```py
UPDATE Countries
SET Country_name ='Kenya'
WHERE Country_id=1;
```

```py
SELECT * from Customers WHERE country = "USA" OR country = "Brazil" 
ORDER BY CustomerName ASC;
```

```py
SELECT * from Products
WHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
```

```py
SELECT * from Customers
WHERE CustomerName LIKE 'A%';
```

```py
SELECT COUNT(CustomerID), Country
FROM Customers
GROUP BY Country;
```

```py
SELECT COUNT(CustomerID), Country
FROM Customers
GROUP BY Country
HAVING COUNT(CustomerID) > 3;
```

```py
SELECT Orders.OrderID, Customers.CustomerName
FROM Orders
INNER JOIN Customers ON Orders.CustomerID = Customers.CustomerID;
```

```py
SELECT Customers.CustomerName, Orders.OrderID
FROM Customers
LEFT JOIN Orders ON Customers.CustomerID = Orders.CustomerID
ORDER BY Customers.CustomerName;
```

```py
SELECT Orders.OrderID, Employees.LastName, Employees.FirstName
FROM Orders
RIGHT JOIN Employees ON Orders.EmployeeID = Employees.EmployeeID
ORDER BY Orders.OrderID;
```

```py
SELECT Customers.CustomerName, Orders.OrderID
FROM Customers
FULL OUTER JOIN Orders ON Customers.CustomerID=Orders.CustomerID
ORDER BY Customers.CustomerName;
```

```py
SELECT MIN(Price) AS LeastPricy
FROM Products;
```

```py
SELECT MAX(Price) AS MostExpensive
FROM Products;
```

```py
SELECT AVG(Price) AS AveragePrice
FROM Products;
```

```py
SELECT COUNT(ProductID)
FROM Products;
```

```py
SELECT SUM(Quantity)
FROM OrderDetails;
```

```py
CREATE INDEX idx_lastname
ON Persons (LastName);
```
